content.question: A cubic polynomial function <math alttext="p"><mi>p</mi></math> has a non-real zero of <math alttext="x equals negative 3 plus i"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi></math>. The graph of <math alttext="y equals p open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> has an <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>-intercept of <math alttext="open parentheses 1 comma 0 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>. Which of the following could be an expression for <math alttext="p open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parentheses x minus 1 close parentheses open parentheses x squared minus 6 x minus 10 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses x minus 1 close parentheses open parentheses x squared minus 6 x plus 10 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses x minus 1 close parentheses open parentheses x squared plus 6 x plus 10 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses x plus 1 close parentheses open parentheses x squared plus 6 x minus 10 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parentheses x minus 1 close parentheses open parentheses x squared plus 6 x plus 10 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
